title: Account recovery question.
body: How long does it usually take before you get a response to these tickets seeing at how its been almost 4 days? Every time I try to view my ticket I am asked to log in, which I can't do because I am trying to recover my account, so do you just receive the response over email? Here is my ticket number #23658243. I had information I needed to add to my ticket but I have no idea how to view the ticket since it wants me to log in to view it.  Note that I am still logged in on the website, but I can't log in to the support site.

replies.body: It can take a bit for our specialists to review the situation and respond, as well as the queue of tickets on the day.  Looking into your specific issue, I see your ticket has been successfully received and escalated to our account team.  They will respond as soon as they can, and you will receive an email for it.  Even if you cannot login to the site, you can continue correspondence completely through the email that will be sent to you.  Hope that helps bring some ease!
Thank you for the reply that cleared up everything thank you
